Verses: 1 nebugaadhnechchaarin Padhinettaam Varushaththukku Sariyaana Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Arasaanda Paththaam Varushaththil Karththaraal Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vaarththai:
2 appozhudhu Baabilon Raajaavin Senai Erusalemai Mutrikkaipottirundhadhu; Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyo, Yoodhaa Raajaavin Aramanaiyilulla Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththile Adaikkappattirundhaan.
3 enendraal, Idho, Indha Nagaraththai Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkiren; Avan Idhaippidippaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraarendrum,

4 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Kaldheyarudaiya Kaikkuth Thappippogaamal, Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Nichchayamaaga Oppukkodukkappaduvaan; Avan Vaai Ivan Vaayode Pesum Avan Kangal Ivan Kangalaikkaanum.

5 avan Sidhekkiyaavai Baabilonukkuk Kondupovaan; Naan Avanai Sandhikkumattum Ange Avan Iruppaan; Neengal Kaldheyarode Yuththampanninaalum Ungalukku Vaaippadhillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraarendrum, Nee Theerkkadharisananchollavendiyadhu Enna Endru Solli, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Ange Avanai Adaiththuvaiththaan.
6 adharku Eremiyaa Sonnadhu: Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

7 idho, Un Periya Thagappanaagiya Salloomin Kumaaran Anaameyel Unnidaththil Vandhu: Aanadhoththilirukkira En Nilaththai Vaangikkol; Adhaik Kollugiradharku Unakke Meetkum Adhigaaram Aduththadhendru Solluvaan Endru Uraiththaar.

8 appadiye En Periya Thagappan Maganaagiya Anaameyel, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadi Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththil Ennidaththukku Vandhu: Benyameen Naattu Aanadhoththoorilulla En Nilaththai Neer Vaangikkollum; Sudhandharapaaththiyam Umakkundu, Adhai Meetkum Adhigaaram Umakku Aduththadhu; Adhai Vaangikkollum Endraan; Appozhudhu Adhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Endru Arindhukonden.

9 aagaiyaal En Periya Thagappan Maganaagiya Anaameyelin Kaiyil, Naan Aanadhoththilirukkira Avanudaiya Nilaththaikkondu, Adhin Vilaikkirayamaagiya Padhinezhu Sekkalidai Velliyai Avanukku Niruththukkoduththen.
10 naan Paththiraththil Kaiyezhuththaiyum, Muththiraiyaiyum Pottu, Saatchigalai Vaiththu, Velliyaith Tharaasile Niruththukkoduththapinbu,
11 naan Sattaththukkum Vazhakkaththukkum Etrapadi Muththiraipodappatta Kirayappaththiraththaiyum Thirandhirukkira Pradhiyaiyum Eduththu,

12 en Periya Thagappan Maganaagiya Anaameyeludaiya Kangalukku Munbaagavum, Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththil Utkaarndhirundha Ellaa Yoodharudaiya Kangalukku Munbaagavum, Adhai Maaseyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Theriyaavin Maganaana Paarookkinidaththil Koduththu,
13 avargaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaagap Paarookkai Nokki:

14 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Nee Muththiraipodappatta Kirayappaththiramum, Thirandhirukkira Pradhipaththiramumaagiya Indha Saasanangalai Vaangi, Avaigal Aneganaalirukkumpadikku Avaigalai Oru Manpaandaththile Vai.
15 enenil Ini Indha Dhesaththil Veedugalum Nilangalum Dhraatchaththottangalum Kollappadumendru, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththarsollugiraar Endren.
16 naan Kirayappaththiraththai Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paarookkinidaththil Koduththapinbu, Naan Karththarai Nokkip Pannina Vinnappamaavadhu:

17 aa, Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Idho, Dhevareer Ummudaiya Magaabalaththinaalum, Neettappatta Ummudaiya Buyaththinaalum, Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkineer; Ummaale Seyyak Koodaadha Adhisayamaana Kaariyam Ondrumillai.

18 aayiram Thalaimuraigalukkum Kirubai Seygiravarum, Pidhaakkaludaiya Akkiramaththai Avargaludaiya Pinnadiyaar Pillaigalin Madiyile Sarikkattugiravarumaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Ennum Naamamulla Magaththuvamum Vallamaiyumulla Dhevane,

19 yosanaiyile Periyavarum, Seyalile Vallavarumaayirukkireer; Avanavanukku Avanavanudaiya Kiriyaiyin Palanukkuth Thakkadhaagavum Alikkumpadi, Ummudaiya Kangal Manupuththirarudaiya Ellaa Vazhigalinmelum Nokkamaayirukkindrana.
20 isravelilum Matra Manusharukkullum Innaalvaraikkum Vilangugira Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Dhevareer Egipthudhesaththile Seydhu, Innaalil Nirkum Keerththiyai Umakku Undaakki,
21 isravelaagiya Umadhu Janaththai Adaiyaalangalinaalum, Arpudhangalinaalum, Balaththa Kaiyinaalum, Ongiya Buyaththinaalum, Magaa Bayangaraththinaalum Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanni,
22 avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Neer Koduppen Endru Aanaiyitta Paalum Thenum Odiya Dhesamaayirukkira Indha Dhesaththai Avargalukkuk Koduththeer.

23 avargal Adharkul Pravesiththu, Adhai Sudhandhariththukkondaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Umadhu Saththaththukku Sevikodaamalum, Umadhu Nyaayappramaanaththil Nadavaamalum, Seyyumpadi Neer Avargalukkuk Karpiththadhondraiyum Seyyaamalum Ponaargal; Aadhalaal Indhath Theengaiyellaam Avargalukku Neridappannineer.

24 idho, Koththalangal Podappattirukkiradhu; Nagaraththaip Pidikka Varugiraargal; Pattayaththinimiththamum, Panjaththinimiththamum, Kollainoyinimiththamum Indha Nagaram Adharku Virodhamaai Yuththampannugira Kaldheyarin Kaiyile Kodukkappadugiradhu; Neer Sonnapadi Sambavikkiradhu; Idho, Neer Adhaip Paarkkireer.

25 karththaraagiya Aandavare, Nagaram Kaldheyarin Kaiyile Kodukkappadugiradhaayirundhum, Dhevareer Ennai Nokki: Nee Unakku Oru Nilaththai Vilaikkirayamaagakkondu, Adharku Saatchigalai Vaiyendru Sonneere Endren.
26 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Eremiyaavukku Undaagi, Avar:
27 idho, Naan Maamsamaana Yaavarukkum Dhevanaagiya Karththar; Ennaale Seyyak Koodaadha Adhisayamaanakaariyam Ondrundo?
28 aadhalaal, Idho, Naan Indha Nagaraththaik Kaldheyarin Kaiyilum, Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarin Kaiyilum Oppukkodukkiren, Avan Idhaip Pidippaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

29 indha Nagaraththukku Virodhamaai Yuththampannugira Kaldheyar Utpravesiththu, Indha Nagaraththaith Theekkoluththi, Idhai Sutterippaargal; Enakkuk Kobamundaakkumpadi Endha Veedugalinmel Paagaalukkuth Thoobankaatti, Anniya Dhevargalukkup Paanapaligalai Vaarththaargalo, Andha Veedugalaiyum Sutterippaargal.

30 isravel Puththirarum Yoodhaa Puththirarum Thangal Siruvayadhumudhal En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhaiye Seydhu Vandhaargal Isravel Puththirar Thangal Kaigalin Seygaiyinaale Enakkuk Kobaththaiye Undaakki Vandhaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

31 avargal Indha Nagaraththaik Kattina Naal Mudharkondu, Innaalvaraikkum Adhu Enakkuk Kobamundaagavum, Enakku Ukkiramundaagavum, Naan Adhai En Mugaththaivittu Agatrugiradharku Edhuvaagavum Irundhadhu.

32 enakkuk Kobamundaagumpadikku Isravel Puththirarum, Yoodhaa Puththirarum, Avargal Raajaakkalum, Avargal Prabukkalum, Avargal Aasaariyargalum, Avargal Theerkkadharisigalum, Yoodhaavin Manusharum, Erusalemin Kudigalum Seydha Ellaap Pollaappinimiththamum Ippadi Nadakkum.
33 mugaththaiyalla, Mudhugai Enakkuk Kaattinaargal; Naan Erkanave Avargalukku Ubadhesiththum Avargal Buththiyai Etrukkolla Sevikodaamarponaargal.
34 avargal En Naamam Tharikkappatta Aalayaththaith Theettuppaduththumpadikku, Thangal Aruvaruppugalai Adhile Vaiththaargal.

35 avargal Molegukkendru Thangal Kumaararaiyum Thangal Kumaaraththigalaiyum Theekkadakkappannumpadi Innomudaiya Kumaararin Pallaththaakkilirukkira Paagaalin Medaigalaik Kattinaargal; Yoodhaavaip Paavancheyyappannuvadharku Avargal Indha Aruvaruppaana Kaariyaththai Seyyavendumendru Naan Avargalukkuk Karpiththadhumillai, Adhu En Manadhile Thondrinadhumillai.

36 ippadiyirukkaiyil Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum, Kollai Noyaalum, Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappattuppom Endru Neengal Sollugira Indha Nagaraththaikkuriththu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:

37 idho, En Sinaththilum, En Kobaththilum, En Magaa Ukkiraththilum, Naan Avargalaith Thuraththina Ellaa Dhesangalilumirundhu Avargalai Serththukkondu, Avargalai Indha Sthalaththukkuth Thirumbivaravum Idhile Sugamaaith Thangiyirukkavum Pannuven.
38 avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen.

39 avargal Thangalukkum, Thangal Pinnadiyaarukkum, Thangal Pillaigalukkum Nanmaiyundaagumpadi Sagala Naatkalilum Enakku Bayappadumpadikku, Naan Avargalukku Ore Irudhayaththaiyum Ore Vazhiyaiyum Kattalaiyittu,

40 avargalukku Nanmaiseyyumpadi, Naan Avargalai Vittup Pinvaanguvadhillaiyengira Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyai Avargalode Panni, Avargal Ennaivittu Agandrupogaadhapadikku, Enakkupbayappadum Bayaththai Avargal Irudhayaththile Vaiththu,
41 avargalukku Nanmai Seyyumpadi Avargalmel Sandhoshamaayirundhu, En Muzhu Irudhayaththodum En Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Avargalai Indha Dhesaththile Nichchayamaai Naattuven.
42 naan Indha Janaththinmel Indhap Periya Theengaiyellaam Varappanninadhupola, Avargalaikkuriththu Sonna Ellaa Nanmaiyaiyum Avargalmel Varappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
43 manushanum Mirugamum Illaadhapadikkup Paazhaaippoyitru Endrum, Kaldheyarin Kaiyile Oppukkodukkappattuppoyitru Endrum, Neengal Sollugira Indha Dhesaththile Nilangal Kollappadum.

44 benyameen Dhesaththilum, Erusalemin Sutruppurangalilum, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum, Malaikkaadaana Pattanangalilum, Pallaththaakkaana Pattanangalilum, Thenthisaippattanangalilum, Nilangal Vilaikkirayamaagak Kollappadugira Paththirangalil Kaiyezhuththup Podugiradhum Muththiraiyidugiradhum Adharku Saatchivaikkiradhum Undaayirukkum; Avargal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
